CustomField.description: Created By Mayank Pant. This field will store the chatter post message for the Job Record owner user.
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("https://genesismotoreurope--dev.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/WorkOrder/"+Id+"/view",WorkOrderNumber) + " is now completed. Please review "+ HYPERLINK("https://genesismotoreurope--dev.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Repair__c/"+Repair__c+"/view",Repair__r.Name)+" if all tasks are done. When everything has been successfully completed inform " + HYPERLINK("https://genesismotoreurope--dev.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Account/"+ AccountId +"/view",Account.Name)+" about his invoice and prepare delivery or pick-up."
CustomField.label: ChatterPostMessage
